Articles.Content: At one point, using CKAN, I managed to get a mod that showed my apoapsis in the little box attached to the top of the navball if i clicked it to show my orbital speed. I don't know what the mod is called, and I can't seem to find it again in CKAN. It was incredibly useful and I really want it back. Unless is was part of another mod, which would be fine too.
It's an option in SpeedUnitAnnex, almost definitely. Works fine in 1.4.5, even though it only mentions 1.4.3.
